title: WE ASSAULTED STUDENTS AT DEHIWALA; STRIPPED THEM NAKED IN PERADENIYA, SAYS SB
content: We assaulted the protesting students at the Dehiwala Higher Technical Institute and chased them away leaving them only with their underwear and in Peradeniya, we stripped the fasting students naked and chased them away, said a beaming S. B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education yesterday. The minister made this statement attending a workshop held in…
